title: UI / UX Designer (Web3 Experience Preferred) Job at Galdun X
content:
Galdun X, established in 2023 as a web development agency, GaldunX has rapidly evolved into a full-service digital agency. Our mission is to onboard exceptional talent and deliver outstanding results for clients and companies. In just a few months, we've assembled a skilled and dedicated team with an average of over three years of experience, all united by a shared commitment to building high-quality products and providing top-notch services.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: UI / UX Designer (Web3 Experience Preferred)

Job Locations: Abuja (FCT), Lagos and Rivers
Employment Type: Remote (Full-Time)

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are looking for a talented UI/UX Designer with a passion for clean design and experience in Web3 products.
	You will be responsible for creating user-friendly interfaces for digital platforms that reflect GaldunX's standard of excellence and innovation.


Responsibilities


	Design user interfaces for web and mobile platforms
	Create wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity mockups
	Collaborate with product and dev teams from concept to launch
	Apply user research to inform design decisions
	Translate complex ideas into clean, intuitive designs
	Integrate Web3 elements into seamless user flows
	Ensure design consistency across all platforms and devices.


Requirements


	Experience: Minimum of 2 Years in UI/UX Design
	Strong UI/UX portfolio (must include live projects or case studies)
	Proficiency in Figma and other standard design tools
	Experience designing for Web3, DeFi, or crypto-related platforms
	Deep understanding of user-centered design principles
	Ability to create responsive, mobile-first interfaces
	Knowledge of design systems and accessibility standards
	Basic knowledge of HTML/CSS


Compensation
N35,000 / month (Review & Increase After 3 Months Based on Performance).

title: Sales Executive Job at Eljo Stores
content:
Eljo Stores is a reputable grocery store located in the heart of Kubwa, Abuja, offering both wholesale and retail services. We pride ourselves on providing quality products at competitive prices, backed by excellent customer service.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales Executive

Job Location: Kubwa, Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	The Sales Executive will be responsible for driving sales, building strong customer relationships, and expanding our client base. This role requires someone who is confident, persuasive, and passionate about retail and marketing.


Key Responsibilities


	Actively seek out new sales opportunities through cold calling, networking, and physical outreach in the Kubwa area and beyond.
	Maintain relationships with existing customers by providing support, guidance, and after-sales service.
	Meet and exceed sales targets set by the management.
	Present, promote, and sell products using solid arguments to both new and existing customers.
	Handle customer inquiries and complaints professionally and promptly.
	Monitor customer preferences and market trends to identify new opportunities and report feedback to management.
	Collaborate with the store team to ensure customer satisfaction and smooth sales operations.
	Ensure daily account reconciliation.


Requirements


	Minimum of OND or equivalent; a degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or a related field is an added advantage.
	At least 2 years of proven experience in a sales or customer-facing role, preferably in a retail or grocery environment.
	Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
	Strong negotiation and persuasive skills.
	Good knowledge of marketing and sales techniques.
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
	Must reside in or around Kubwa, Abuja.
	Proficiency in using mobile appsis an added advantage.


What We Offer


	Competitive salary with performance-based incentives.
	A friendly and supportive work environment.
	Opportunities for career growth and development.
	Staff discounts and benefits.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: eljoinservices@gmail.com using "Application for Sales Executive – Eljo Stores" as the subject of the mail.

Note


	If you're passionate about sales and customer service and want to grow with a trusted brand, we’d love to hear from you.
	Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.
